properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manujulu meedu manchi kriyalanu kani tandrini mahimaparchaga Vinayamuna mee velugu vaariki kanapadaga prakaasinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kondameeda nundu pattanamu undaneradu marugai nijamuga dandiga manadu thandri swaroopamu undaga meelo prakasinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni vaakyamu velugai yunnadi jeevinchudi velugunu kaligi pavanamagu sahavaasamu kaligi devuni atmato nindi vardilledu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maranachchaayalo meerundagaa parama velugu prakaasinchenu parugide cheekati velugu dayinchagaa parishuddaatma phalamulu pondina{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Meerikameedata paradesulunu parajanuluga nundaka yunduru parishuddulato neka pourulai devuni gruhamuganai yunna{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ratri pagalu bedamuleka chandruni suryuni kaantiyu leka prabhuvagu devudu prakasinchunu yuga yugamula kaayana raajyamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuvagu devude jeevamai yundiyu uppuga jesenu mimmunu tanakai uppunuboli saaramu kaligi Prabhu Yesunakae halleluya padudi{/lang-eng}
